articles.author: Rupam Jain
articles.title: India ask FBI to share intelligence on Sikh separatists - source - Reuters India
articles.description: India has asked the United States to share intelligence on Sikh separatists living there amid investigations into an accusation that an Indian official was linked to a plot to kill a Sikh separatist on American soil, an Indian official said on Tuesday.
